kv17.11:1.3: Nanu atthi keci paṭiggāhakā āhuneyyā pāhuneyyā dakkhiṇeyyā añjalikaraṇīyā anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassāti?
kv17.11:1.5: Hañci atthi keci paṭiggāhakā āhuneyyā pāhuneyyā dakkhiṇeyyā añjalikaraṇīyā anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv17.11:2.3: Nanu cattāro purisayugā aṭṭha purisapuggalā dakkhiṇeyyā vuttā bhagavatāti?
kv17.11:2.5: Hañci cattāro purisayugā aṭṭha purisapuggalā dakkhiṇeyyā vuttā bhagavatā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv17.11:3.3: Nanu atthi keci sotāpanne dānaṁ datvā dakkhiṇaṁ ārādhentīti?
kv17.11:3.5: Hañci atthi keci sotāpanne dānaṁ datvā dakkhiṇaṁ ārādhenti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv17.11:4.5: Hañci atthi keci arahato dānaṁ datvā dakkhiṇaṁ ārādhenti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv17.11:5.3: Añño aññassa kārako, parakataṁ sukhadukkhaṁ, añño karoti añño paṭisaṁvedetīti?
kv17.11:6.6: Atthānanda, dakkhiṇā dāyakato visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato;
kv17.11:6.7: atthānanda, dakkhiṇā paṭiggāhakato visujjhati, no dāyakato;
kv17.11:6.8: atthānanda, dakkhiṇā dāyakato ceva visujjhati paṭiggāhakato ca;
kv17.11:6.9: atthānanda, dakkhiṇā neva dāyakato visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato.
kv17.11:6.10: Imā kho, ānanda, catasso dakkhiṇā visuddhiyo”ti.
